page.title: 03TRANSPORT,NW NEWBURY & SPEEN
page.content: {PUBLIC ROAD TRANSPORT}run by {ALDER {VALLEY BUS CO.}Two services serve local housing estates;buses run 3 return journies every day bar Sundays.Other services pass through area covering outlying towns & villages.X34 runs through area N/S,S/N on an average of 4 return services per day,serving main Oxford/Southampton route via Newbury.Present day return fare to Southampton Â£2.25. {PRIVATE TRANSPORT}is by family car,owned by 60% to 70% of families and by cars owned by individual family members. {BRITISH RAIL,WESTERN REGION}provide travel facilities East & West particularly for commuters. {FLIGHTS}heading West from London Airport often heard overflying.Area crisscrossed by helicopter flights,mostly by Service aircraft.
